world: Welcome to the world of Valesco
euroTech: The EuroTec brand belongs to the VALESCO lubricants company.

productRangeDescription: There are many different cars in Russia. And we have many different oils, including those with tolerances and specifications from European and American automakers.
useOurSelector: Use our selector to determine which oil is suitable for your car.

большим: VALESCO knows that every car is unique — and we understand exactly what it needs! Our range includes engine oils and technical fluids tested according to European, American, and Asian standards.Use our oil selector to quickly, easily, and accurately find the perfect oil for your vehicle.
масел: With VALESCO, your car gets only the best.

строит: VALESCO builds entire industries and invests in businesses that change the rules of the game for all participants. We prioritize long-term success and prosperity for the benefit of future generations.

addressValesco: Republic of Uzbekistan, Tashkent Region, Zangiota District, Erkin Rural Citizens’ Assembly, Zafarobod Street, House 28
какие-либо: If you have any questions or need additional information, we are always available. Leave a request, and our specialists will contact you as soon as possible.

Наша компания: Our company is a manufacturer of motor oil, brake fluids, coolants and auto chemicals
начало: In 2019, the company begin producing motor oils under the VALESCO brand, which meet international standards. The company was founded in 2011 as an Uzbek-Korean joint venture, GLOBAL PETROCHEMICAL GROUP, in Tashkent.
производства: All stages of production (including packaging production) are carried out using our own technological equipment. Thorough quality control is performed at every stage of production
Продукция компании: GPG’s products fully comply with all necessary standards, have successfully passed tests in accredited laboratories and have test protocols, as well as certification from the Agency for Standardization, Metrology and Certification “UzStandard”, and have been approved for production and use in vehicles in accordance with TU 64-23424406-01:2012.
Так как: Since the products of “GLOBAL PETROCHEMICAL GROUP” meet the requirements of global automakers, our company has been actively entering the CIS market since 2012. The company exports its products to countries such as Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Turkmenistan, and others.
России много: With us, you will find everything necessary for the reliable operation of your vehicle: engine oils for passenger cars and light commercial vehicles, special oils for diesel engines, transmission and hydraulic fluids. Our assortment also includes brake fluids, antifreeze, and filters — everything to ensure your equipment lasts longer and works flawlessly.
Воспользуйтесь нашим: With VALESCO, your car is always in safe hands.
По выбранным: No products were found matching the selected filters
imgsDesc: VALESCO offers a full range of products with a high vertical production range, always manufactured in audited sustainable processes. In addition to many motor oils and winter chemicals for many various types of vehicles, we also offer lubricants for a wide variety of other utilisations and applications, for example in the industrial sector. VALESCO products are available in more than 15 countries worldwide today and impress more people every day with their outstanding properties.

more than: Valesco Oil is more than just engine oil. It's the symbol of modern engineering and pure performance. Our innovative formulas power the heart of your vehicle.
